pipeline@43.label: Bounding box and CRS
pipeline@43.description: Select a country/region and a CRS to obtain the associated bounding box.

data>loadFromStac.yml@42|collections_ite.description:
Vector of strings. To pull specific collection items, input the collection name followed by '|' followed by item id (e.g. "chelsa-clim|bio1"). To extract a whole collection, type the collection name only (e.g. "chelsa-clim"). To pull collection items by date, write the collection name and provide a start date, end date, and temporal resolution.

Layers used in this pipeline must be categorical variables (e.g. landcover).
data>loadFromStac.yml@42|collections_ite.label: STAC collection items

data>loadFromStac.yml@42|t0.description: Start date for time series layers in format YYYY-MM-DD. Leave blank if extracting items by name.
data>loadFromStac.yml@42|t0.label: Start date

data>loadFromStac.yml@42|t1.description: End date for time series layers in format YYYY-MM-DD. Leave blank if extracting items by name.
data>loadFromStac.yml@42|t1.label: End date

data>loadFromStac.yml@42|temporal_res.description: Temporal resolution to use when querying STAC items by date, in the format ("P", time interval, and time unit, e.g. "P1Y" is yearly, "P1M" is montly, and "P1D" is daily). Leave blank if not querying by date. If the temporal resolution is coarser than the temporal resolution of the time series, the layers will be aggregated with the aggregation method chosen below.
data>loadFromStac.yml@42|temporal_res.label: Temporal resolution

data>loadFromStac.yml@42|spatial_res.description:
Integer, spatial resolution of the rasters in the same units as the coordinate reference system (meters for projected reference systems and degrees for reference systems in lat long). 

Leave blank to maintain the original spatial resolution of the layer.
data>loadFromStac.yml@42|spatial_res.label: Spatial resolution (optional)

data>loadFromStac.yml@42|resampling.description: Resampling method used when rescaling and/or reprojecting the raster layers. See [gdalwarp](https://gdal.org/en/latest/programs/gdalwarp.html) for description.
data>loadFromStac.yml@42|resampling.label: Resampling method

data>loadFromStac.yml@42|aggregation.description: Method used to aggregate items when layers combining over time.
data>loadFromStac.yml@42|aggregation.label: Aggregation method

zonal_statistics>percentage_cover_classe.description: Percentage of each categorical class in a raster layer over a polygon or bounding box of interest
zonal_statistics>percentage_cover_classe.label: Percentage of classes

data>load_polygons.yml@44|polygon.description: Polygons of the country, WDPA, EEZs for the country or region of interest
data>load_polygons.yml@44|polygon.label: Polygon

metadata.name: Percentage of raster classes
metadata.description: Calculate percentage of classes over a bounding box or polygon of interest in categorical rasters.
